content: First off, show both sides. The ceo of under armor made comments about trump and he got completely lambasted and the stock dropped. So it’s not like backlash is limited to rich white guys and republicans. Liberals have a huge consumer bias too. Second, seeing that happen, as a business owner or investor do you really want your business making any political comments? I certainly wouldn’t. Politics are too divisive now and shouldn’t be in the work place. Sure you can say whatever you want, but you must accept the consequences.
